{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking about the structure that holds bones together. A. Suture is incorrect because sutures are immovable joints found only in the skull. B. Gomphosis is incorrect because it refers to the specialized joint that holds teeth in their sockets. C. Synchondrosis is incorrect because it is a type of cartilaginous joint found in growing bones. D. Syndesmosis is the correct answer because it refers to a type of joint where bones are held together by a sheet or cord of dense fibrous connective tissue, such as the interosseous membrane between the radius and ulna in the forearm.", "answer_choice": "D"}
